name: PointerPropertiesGaugeOptions

properties.name: pointerColor
properties.description: Color of the pointer (used only in the custom preset)
properties.rawdescription: Color of the pointer (used only in the custom preset)

properties.name: pointerLenghtRatio
properties.description: Length of the pointer as a ratio relative to the container size (overrides pointerLength)
properties.rawdescription: Length of the pointer as a ratio relative to the container size (overrides pointerLength)

properties.name: pointerOffset
properties.description: Offset of the pointer from the center
properties.rawdescription: Offset of the pointer from the center

properties.name: pointerStyle
properties.rawdescription: Style of the pointer (e.g., custom path)

properties.name: pointerWidthRatio
properties.description: Width of the pointer as a ratio relative to the container size (overrides pointerWidth)
properties.rawdescription: Width of the pointer as a ratio relative to the container size (overrides pointerWidth)

description: Properties related to the pointer of the gauge
rawdescription: Properties related to the pointer of the gauge
